Class NetworkMapGenerator

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object

      • NetworkMapGenerator

        public NetworkMapGenerator(int networkSize,
                           int channelsPerNode,
                           Load load)
        Constructor to create a Network Map Generator object entity with all the required parameters.
        Parameters:
        networkSize - Number of nodes to generate the network map
        channelsPerNode - Number of channels per node to generate the network map
        load - Load object to fetch local data from the simulation

      • init

        private void init(int nodeSize,
                  int channelsPerNode,
                  int transactionSize,
                  Load load)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Method to write start the Network data model writing into the JSON Network Map.
        Parameters:
        nodeSize - Number of nodes to write into the network map
        channelsPerNode - Number of channels per node to write into the network map
        transactionSize - Number of transactions to write into the network map
        load - Load object to fetch local data from the simulation
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the file to write the network map is not found

      • writeSimulationResults

        private void writeSimulationResults(Load load,
                                    org.json.simple.JSONObject json)
        Method to assist the writing process of the simulation results at the end of the simulation.
        Parameters:
        load - Load object to fetch local data from the simulation
        json - JSON object to write the data

      • writeChannels

        private int writeChannels(int nodeSize,
                          int transactionSize,
                          int nodeFrom,
                          int channelId,
                          int i,
                          org.json.simple.JSONArray channelsArray)
        Method to assist the writing process of the network map generation. This method is focused on writing the channels into the network map using the network data model syntax.
        Parameters:
        nodeSize - Number of nodes to write into the network map
        transactionSize - Number of transactions to write into the network map
        nodeFrom - Id from the current node who owns the channel
        channelId - Channel id of the current channel
        i - Number to ensure the a channel is not opened to 0 or to the same node
        channelsArray - List of channels to write in the network map
        Returns:
        the channel id of the current channel

      • writeTransactions

        private void writeTransactions(org.json.simple.JSONArray transactionArray,
                               Transaction currentTransaction)
        Method to assist the writing process of the network map generation. This method is focused on writing the trannsactions into the network map using the network data model syntax once the simulation has ended.
        Parameters:
        transactionArray - List of transactions simulated in the network
        currentTransaction - Transaction which is being currently written into the network map
